messages.title: Britain is going in the wrong direction under the Conservatives.
messages.content: The only way to get a real opposition is to back Tim Farron's Liberal Democrats on 8th June.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Keep Britain in the single market
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Advocates for maintaining Britain's position in the European single market.
Committed to safeguarding the National Health Service.
Focused on preserving funding for schools.

issues.brexitEurope: Keep Britain in the single market
issues.governance: Britain is going in the wrong direction under the Conservatives.

contactInformation.address: Liberal Democrats at 8-10 Great George Street, London, SW1P 3AE

images.caption: Tim Farron and the Lib Dems will deliver real change
